1.name: Studio
1.subtitle: A blend of elegance and comfort
1.description: Chalet-style suites feature eco-friendly bamboo furnishings, yellow ambient lighting, and large windows with forest views. Designed for comfort and serenity. Experience luxury and comfort in our elegantly designed Suite. Perfect for couples seeking a romantic getaway with modern amenities and stunning views.

checkInRules: Early check-in subject to availability (additional charges may apply)
checkOutRules: Late check-out until 2:00 PM (50% of room rate)

2.name: Deluxe Suite
2.subtitle: Enhanced luxury with premium amenities
2.description: Deluxe Suites are spacious, chalet-style rooms ideal for families or groups, featuring separate beds for kids. Include a front veranda and natural ventilation. Spacious deluxe suites offering enhanced comfort with premium amenities and stunning views of the surrounding landscape.

additionalAmenities.icon: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  width="24"  height="24"  viewBox="0 0 24 24"  fill="none"  stroke="currentColor"  stroke-width="2"  stroke-linecap="round"  stroke-linejoin="round"  class="icon icon-tabler icons-tabler-outline icon-tabler-air-conditioning text-almaris-gold"><path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M8 16a3 3 0 0 1 -3 3" /><path d="M16 16a3 3 0 0 0 3 3" /><path d="M12 16v4" /><path d="M3 5m0 2a2 2 0 0 1 2 -2h14a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v4a2 2 0 0 1 -2 2h-14a2 2 0 0 1 -2 -2z" /><path d="M7 13v-3a1 1 0 0 1 1 -1h8a1 1 0 0 1 1 1v3" /></svg>

additionalAmenities.name: 42-inch Smart TV

checkInRules: Valid government ID and address proof required
Complimentary early check-in for loyalty members
checkOutRules: Late check-out until 3:00 PM (complimentary for stays 3+ nights)

3.name: Super Deluxe Suite
3.subtitle: Ultimate luxury experience
3.description: Our most luxurious suites featuring exceptional space, premium furnishings, and exclusive amenities for the ultimate experience.

4.name: Bungalow (2/3/4 BHK)
4.subtitle: Private sanctuary in nature
4.description: Private bungalows offering complete privacy and independence with all modern amenities in a serene natural setting.
